I want to add a "ModuleGrappleNode" to Kodiak to realism the docking system.

But soon I find out that it could work only one time, once you release it from the mothership, it can no longer dock again.

If it need a animation to reset the location or something related?

Kodiak has 2 animations for door and antenna, how could I modified the "deployAnimationController" option?
